items.title: ASTR 100L Instructor
items.description: Led lab sections for ASTR 100L, an introductory astronomy course.

items.title: ERIRA Instructor (Green Bank Observatory)
items.description: Instructed students on 40ft/20m radio telescopes. Led undergraduate research teams in instrumentation and software projects.

items.title: Morehead Guest Night Operator
items.description: Bi-weekly science outreach, operating telescopes, and explaining astronomy research to the public.

items.title: Skynet 2.0
items.description:
Leading the radio astronomy development for Skynet 2.0.
Designed a scalable architecture for new sites/instruments and models to generalize radio astronomy hardware.
Implemented a web interface for radio observation.
Currently working on single dish radio mapping path computation and optimization.

items.title: Astromancer
items.description: A complete reimagination of the Skynet Plotting Tool. Designed a modular, scalable architecture and improved accessibility. Serving 4,900+ users since Fall 2023.

items.title: Astronomicon
items.description: Designed architecture and oversaw development of a web-based citizen science platform. Allows users to contribute analysis results from Astromancer to a collective database.

items.title: Radio Cartographer
items.description: Updated radio cartography algorithms for single-dish maps. Implemented data management services to transfer radio map data from Green Bank Observatory to UNC Skynet.

items.title: Gamma Ray Burst Followup
items.description: Conducted rapid-response observations of GRBs detected by NASA's SWIFT spacecraft using Skynet. Collaborated with the team to contribute to NASA's General Coordinate Network (GCN).

items.title: Bing Wallpaper for Mac with GUI
items.description: A desktop client (menubar app) of Bing Wallpaper for MacOS, written in Swift.
